place.name: Hall
place.description: You are at one end of a vast hall stretching forward out of sight to the west, filled with wisps of white mist that sway to and fro almost as if alive.

place.name: Building
place.description: You are inside a building, a well house for a large spring.

place.name: Road
place.description: You are standing at the end of a road before a small brick building. Around you is a forest. A small stream flows out of the building and down a gully.
